query.select: SELECT o.budget_journal_number attr_1, o.bgt_jour_type_desc attr_2, o.period_strategy_name attr_3, o.sum_amount attr_4, o.budget_structures_desc attr_5, o.version_name attr_6, o.scenario_name attr_7, o.period_year attr_8, o.create_date_display attr_9, o.employee_name attr_10, o.position_display attr_11, o.status_name attr_12, o.journal_header_notes attr_13 FROM (SELECT t1.journal_header_id, t1.company_id, t1.operation_unit_id, t1.bgt_org_id, t1.budget_structure_id, t1.budget_journal_number, t1.period_year, t1.period_quarter, t1.period_name, t1.bgt_period_num, t1.journal_header_notes, t1.scenario_id, t1.version_id, t1.status, (SELECT scv.code_value_name FROM sys_code_values_v scv WHERE scv.code = 'BGT_BUDGET_STATUS' AND scv.code_value = t1.status) status_name, t1.reversed_flag, t1.source_budget_header_id, t1.approved_date, t1.approved_by, t1.posted_date, t1.posted_by, t1.source_type, (SELECT description_text FROM fnd_descriptions fd WHERE fd.description_id = fo.description_id AND fd.language = 'ZHS') AS operation_unit_name, (SELECT description_text FROM fnd_descriptions fd WHERE fd.description_id = bv.description_id AND fd.language = 'ZHS') AS version_name, (SELECT description_text FROM fnd_descriptions fd WHERE fd.description_id = bs.description_id AND fd.language = 'ZHS') AS scenario_name, (SELECT scv.code_value_name FROM sys_codes sc, sys_code_values_vl scv WHERE sc.code_id = scv.code_id AND sc.code = 'BUDGET_PERIOD' AND sc.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND scv.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND bbs.period_strategy = scv.code_value) AS period_strategy_name, (SELECT scv.code_value_name FROM sys_codes sc, sys_code_values_vl scv WHERE sc.code_id = scv.code_id AND sc.code = 'CSH_REVERSE_SELECT' AND sc.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND scv.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND nvl(t1.reversed_flag, 'N') = scv.code_value) AS reversed_status, (SELECT description FROM bgt_period_sets_vl vv WHERE vv.bgt_period_set_code = bbs.period_set_code AND vv.bgt_org_id = bbs.bgt_org_id) AS period_set_name, t1.bgt_journal_type_id, (SELECT bjt.description FROM bgt_journal_types_vl bjt WHERE bjt.bgt_journal_type_id = t1.bgt_journal_type_id) AS bgt_jour_type_desc, (SELECT ee.employee_code || ' - ' || NAME FROM exp_employees ee WHERE ee.employee_id = t1.employee_id) AS employee_name, (SELECT eop.description FROM exp_org_position_vl eop WHERE eop.position_id = t1.position_id) AS position_display, to_char(t1.creation_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS create_date_display, (SELECT SUM(bjl.amount) FROM bgt_journal_lines bjl WHERE bjl.journal_header_id = t1.journal_header_id) AS sum_amount, bbs.description AS budget_structures_desc, bbs.period_set_code, bbs.bgt_org_id AS bbs_bgt_org_id, bbs.period_strategy, fo.description_id AS fo_description_id, bv.description_id AS bv_description_id, bs.description_id FROM bgt_journal_headers t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN bgt_budget_structures_vl bbs ON t1.budget_structure_id = bbs.budget_structure_id LEFT OUTER JOIN fnd_operation_units fo ON t1.operation_unit_id = fo.operation_unit_id LEFT OUTER JOIN bgt_versions bv ON t1.version_id = bv.version_id LEFT OUTER JOIN bgt_scenarios bs ON t1.scenario_id = bs.scenario_id WHERE t1.budget_journal_number = ${@param_1} AND (${@param_2} IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM wfl_instance_node_recipient wi, wfl_workflow_instance wwi WHERE wi.instance_id = wwi.instance_id AND wwi.document_number = t1.budget_journal_number AND wi.record_id = nvl(${@param_2}, wi.record_id)))) o

SELECT rownum attr_1, o.company_name attr_2, o.responsibility_center_name attr_3, o.description attr_4, o.line_period_name attr_5, o.line_period_quarter attr_6, o.line_period_year attr_7, o.currency_name attr_8, o.exchange_rate_type attr_9, o.exchange_rate_quotation attr_10, o.exchange_rate attr_11, o.amount attr_12, o.functional_amount attr_13, o.quantity attr_14, o.uom attr_15, o.journal_lines_notes attr_16, o.d13 attr_17, o.d5 attr_18, o.d15 attr_19, o.d8 attr_20 FROM (SELECT t.journal_header_id, t.journal_line_id, t.responsibility_center_id center_id, (SELECT responsibility_center_name FROM fnd_responsibility_centers_vl WHERE responsibility_center_id = t.responsibility_center_id) AS responsibility_center_name, t.budget_item_id, (SELECT description FROM bgt_budget_items_vl WHERE budget_item_id = t.budget_item_id) AS description, decode((SELECT description FROM bgt_budget_items_vl WHERE budget_item_id = t.budget_item_id), '效益工资', 1, 0) budget_item_seq, t.currency AS currency_code, (SELECT currency_name FROM gld_currency_vl gb WHERE gb.currency_code = t.currency) AS currency_name, t.exchange_rate_type AS exchange_rate_type_code, (SELECT type_name FROM gld_exchangerate_types_vl WHERE type_code = t.exchange_rate_type) AS exchange_rate_type, t.exchange_rate_quotation AS exchange_rate_quotation_code, (SELECT code_value_name FROM sys_code_values_vl WHERE code_value = t.exchange_rate_quotation) AS exchange_rate_quotation, t.line_period_year, t.line_period_quarter, t.line_period_name, t.line_bgt_period_num, t.exchange_rate, t.amount, t.functional_amount, t.quantity, t.uom, t.company_id, (SELECT c.company_short_name FROM fnd_companies_vl c WHERE c.company_id = t.company_id) AS company_name, t.operation_unit_id AS e12, (SELECT description FROM fnd_operation_units_vl WHERE operation_unit_id = t.operation_unit_id) AS d12, t.unit_id AS e13, (SELECT description FROM exp_org_unit_vl WHERE unit_id = t.unit_id) AS d13, t.position_id AS e14, (SELECT description FROM exp_org_position_vl WHERE position_id = t.position_id) AS d14, t.employee_id AS e15, (SELECT NAME FROM exp_employees WHERE employee_id = t.employee_id) AS d15, t.journal_lines_notes, t.dimension1_id AS e1, (SELECT description FROM fnd_dimension_values_vl WHERE dimension_value_id = t.dimension1_id) AS d1, t.dimension2_id AS e2, (SELECT description FROM fnd_dimension_values_vl WHERE dimension_value_id = t.dimension2_id) AS d2, t.dimension3_id AS e3, (SELECT description FROM fnd_dimension_values_vl WHERE dimension_value_id = t.dimension3_id) AS d3, t.dimension4_id AS e4, (SELECT description FROM fnd_dimension_values_vl WHERE dimension_value_id = t.dimension4_id) AS d4, t.dimension5_id AS e5, (SELECT description FROM fnd_dimension_values_vl WHERE dimension_value_id = t.dimension5_id) AS d5, t.dimension6_id AS e6, (SELECT description FROM fnd_dimension_values_vl WHERE dimension_value_id = t.dimension6_id) AS d6, t.dimension7_id AS e7, (SELECT description FROM fnd_dimension_values_vl WHERE dimension_value_id = t.dimension7_id) AS d7, t.dimension8_id AS e8, (SELECT description FROM fnd_dimension_values_vl WHERE dimension_value_id = t.dimension8_id) AS d8, t.dimension9_id AS e9, (SELECT description FROM fnd_dimension_values_vl WHERE dimension_value_id = t.dimension9_id) AS d9, t.dimension10_id AS e10, (SELECT description FROM fnd_dimension_values_vl WHERE dimension_value_id = t.dimension10_id) AS d10, gso.functional_currency_code, fr.responsibility_center_name center_id_display, bb.description budget_item_id_display FROM bgt_journal_lines t, gld_set_of_books_vl gso, fnd_companies fc, fnd_responsibility_centers_vl fr, bgt_budget_items_vl bb, bgt_journal_headers bh WHERE gso.set_of_books_id = fc.set_of_books_id AND t.responsibility_center_id = fr.responsibility_center_id(+) AND t.budget_item_id = bb.budget_item_id(+) AND fc.company_code = '1000000' and t.journal_header_id = bh.journal_header_id AND bh.budget_journal_number = ${@param_1} AND (${@param_2} IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM wfl_instance_node_recipient wi, wfl_workflow_instance wwi WHERE wi.instance_id = wwi.instance_id AND wwi.document_number = bh.budget_journal_number AND wi.record_id = nvl(${@param_2}, wi.record_id)))) o
